description: Discover the ins and outs of making the best steamed Christmas pudding. You'll be a master of this classic festive dessert with our insider tips.
name: Steamed Christmas Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Woolworths free range eggs, lightly beaten
0.5 cup Woolworths soft & juicy pitted dates, roughly chopped

HowToTip.tipText: Make your fruit mince up to one month* ahead. Store in an airtight glass or ceramic container in a cool, dark place. Avoid using a metal bowl as it may taint the flavour.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the fruit mince, place all the ingredients in a large bowl. Stir until well combined. Cover and stand overnight or up to 1 month (see tips).
Grease an 8-cup capacity metal pudding basin with a lid. Line base with 2 sheets of baking paper. Grease inside of lid.

Stir apple and egg into fruit mince. Add butter and stir to combine. Add flour and breadcrumbs, then stir to combine. Spoon mixture into basin. Level top. Tap pan gently on bench to remove any air bubbles. Level top and secure lid.

Place basin in a large saucepan. Pour boiling water into saucepan until it comes halfway up side of basin. Cover saucepan, then place over medium heat and bring to the boil. Boil for 5 hours, adding boiling water, if needed. Remove pan from heat.
Carefully lift basin from water. Stand for 10 minutes. Remove lid. Turn out pudding onto a platter. Serve drizzled with caramel sauce.
